greetings.0: You've just updated plugins to version {@version}!
greetings.1: The '{@project}' is non-commercial project and needs financial support for the further development.
greetings.2: You may help the open source collection of plugins to grow by visiting the following link and submitting donations to the project:
greetings.3: Remember that subscription and regular small donations will give more benefits to the project than one-time donations.
greetings.4: To not to be very annoying, this dialog will be shown only after each version update of plugins.
